name: DMA Coding & AI Camp
description: Week-long day camp teaching coding fundamentals and AI concepts. Students learn Python, machine learning basics, and create AI-powered projects.

name: DMA Game Design Camp
description: Intensive game development camp using Unity and Unreal Engine. Students create 3D games while learning programming and design principles.

name: DMA Robotics Engineering Camp
description: Hands-on robotics camp with VEX and LEGO platforms. Students build and program robots while learning engineering concepts.

name: DMA Roblox Game Development
description: Create multiplayer games on Roblox platform. Learn Lua programming and game design while building interactive experiences.

name: DMA Minecraft Modding Camp
description: Learn Java programming through Minecraft modding. Create custom mods and understand game development fundamentals.

name: DMA Python Coding & AI
description: Advanced Python programming with machine learning applications. Build AI projects including chatbots and image recognition systems.

name: DMA Java Coding Camp
description: Comprehensive Java programming course covering object-oriented programming and software development principles.

name: DMA C++ Programming Camp
description: Learn C++ for game development and systems programming. Build projects while mastering advanced programming concepts.

name: DMA Mobile App Development
description: Create iOS and Android apps using Swift and Kotlin. Learn mobile development from concept to deployment.

name: DMA VR/AR Development Camp
description: Build virtual and augmented reality experiences using Unity. Learn 3D development and immersive technology design.
stem_fields: Virtual Reality, Computer Science, Game Design

name: DMA Cybersecurity & Encryption
description: Learn ethical hacking and cybersecurity fundamentals. Understand encryption, network security, and digital safety.

name: DMA 3D Modeling & Printing
description: Create 3D models using Blender and print designs. Learn CAD software and manufacturing principles.

name: DMA Video Production & Editing
description: Learn professional video editing with Adobe Premiere and After Effects. Create films and understand media production.

name: DMA Esports & Game Strategy
description: Competitive gaming camp with strategic thinking and teamwork. Learn game analysis and professional esports skills.

name: DMA Digital Art & Design
description: Create digital artwork using Photoshop and Illustrator. Learn graphic design principles and digital illustration.

name: DMA Web Development Camp
description: Build responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Learn full-stack web development fundamentals.

name: DMA Drone Programming
description: Program and fly drones while learning aeronautics and robotics. Combine hardware with software skills.

name: DMA Music Production & DJing
description: Create electronic music using digital audio workstations. Learn music theory and production techniques.

name: DMA Fortnite Creative Camp
description: Design custom Fortnite maps and game modes. Learn level design and game mechanics.

name: DMA YouTube Content Creation
description: Learn video production, editing, and content strategy for YouTube. Build an online presence and media skills.

name: DMA Machine Learning & Data Science
description: Introduction to data science and machine learning with Python. Analyze datasets and build predictive models.

name: DMA Scratch Programming
description: Visual programming with Scratch for beginners. Learn coding logic through interactive games and animations.

name: DMA Intro to Engineering
description: Hands-on engineering challenges using STEM kits. Build bridges, machines, and learn physics principles.

name: DMA Blockchain & Cryptocurrency
description: Understand blockchain technology and cryptocurrency fundamentals. Learn about decentralized systems and digital assets.

name: DMA AI Ethics & Society
description: Explore ethical implications of artificial intelligence. Discuss AI bias, privacy, and responsible technology development.

name: DMA Advanced Unity Game Dev
description: Advanced game development with Unity engine. Create complex 3D games with physics, AI, and multiplayer features.

name: DMA Arduino Engineering
description: Build electronic projects with Arduino microcontrollers. Learn circuit design and embedded programming.

name: DMA Photography & Photoshop
description: Learn digital photography and photo editing. Master camera techniques and Adobe Photoshop skills.

name: DMA App Inventor for Beginners
description: Create mobile apps without coding using MIT App Inventor. Learn app design and user interface principles.

name: DMA Competitive Programming
description: Prepare for coding competitions with algorithm training. Solve complex problems and optimize code efficiency.

name: DMA Game Art & Animation
description: Create 2D and 3D game assets using professional tools. Learn character design and animation techniques.

name: DMA Discord Bot Development
description: Build custom Discord bots using Python. Learn API integration and bot programming.

name: DMA Environmental Tech & Sustainability
description: Use technology to solve environmental challenges. Learn about renewable energy and sustainable design.

name: DMA Raspberry Pi Projects
description: Build computer projects with Raspberry Pi. Learn Linux, hardware interfacing, and embedded systems.

name: DMA Podcast Production
description: Create and produce podcasts from concept to publication. Learn audio editing and storytelling techniques.
